infobox.Japanese title:: タイムリミットは15時!  (Taimu Rimitto wa Jūgo-ji!)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ai Haibara  Ran Mouri  Detective Boys  Hiroshi Agasa
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Kenichi Ogata as Hiroshi Agasa  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Kenji Hamada as Police detective  Koji Yusa as Dam officer  Naoki Makishima as Guard  Takahiro Mizushima as Rescue worker  Rumi Kasahara as Misa Tsuneyama  Masaya Onosaka as Masashi Horikoshi

sections.Situation:
Conan, Haibara, and the Detective Boys are on a camping trip in Omadai, a village near Kofu, in Yamanashi Prefecture, accompanied by Professor Agasa and Ran. Later they witness an arguing couples who then leaves. They then set up the tent in the couple's area. Later, the couple returns demanding their place back and the girlfriend decides to let them have it. Later Ran is drugged and kidnapped.

The kidnapper is later found in another car in a road accident.

The boyfriend revealed he knew the guy since he saw him push someone off a railroad one day.

sections.Trivia:
- Omadai Dam is modeled after Ogouchi Dam.
- The kidnapper's car is a green Toyota Land Cruiser J80, with the license plate 32-18.
- Takada's car is a blue Nissan Bluebird U12.
- Masashi Horikoshi's car is a white Fiat Panda First generation (141A), with a license plate of 17-83.
- Hiroshi Agasa's new car is a Nissan Elgrand E51, with the license plate 2-96.
- The book Ran finished reading in the opening scene is titled Sleeping Beauty's Close Call.
